soweli suwi li lon!

mi lukin e soweli suwi. 

kute pi soweli suwi li suli. 

soweli li lukin e mi. 

n……

soweli li wile e seme?

soweli li lukin e mi tan seme?

mi sona ala. 

a, soweli li tawa. 

tawa pona, soweli o!
en:
A cute animal exists! 

I look at the cute animal. 

The cute animal's ears are big. 

The animal looks at me. 

Hm…… 

The animal wants what? 

The animal looks at me because what? 

I don't know. 

Ah, the animal is moving. 

Move well, animal!
sp:
soweli suwi li lon

mi lukin e soweli suwi

kute pi soweli suwi li suli 

soweli li lukin e mi

nnn

soweli li wile e seme

soweli li lukin e mi tan seme

mi sona ala 

a zz soweli li tawa

tawa pona zz soweli o
